thread.title: flaunts her ample cleavage in a bodysuit
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez flaunts her ample cleavage in a bodysuit | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: flaunts her ample cleavage in a bodysuit
text:
She recently revealed that she has far more body confidence aged 47 than she did in her 20s.
And Jennifer Lopez showed off the figure she's so proud of in a series of saucy snapshots on Thursday.
Taking to Instagram, the I'm Real hitmaker flaunted her tanned and toned pins in a tiny white ribbed dress as she reclined on her sofas.
Scroll down for video
Leggy lady! She recently revealed that she has more body confidence than ever before. And Jennifer Lopez showed off the figure she's so proud of in saucy snapshots on Thursday
Captioned: 'After show feels...' the songstress was no doubt recovering from her All I Have Las Vegas residency.
And whilst she always pulls out the stops for her performances, she revealed her fans are in for a treat as she showed off the new costume she'll be sporting.
Featuring a scoop neckline, the figure-hugging white bodysuit offered a good look at her ample cleavage, with the sequins and beading arranged into the shape of hands clasped together in prayer.
She captioned the snap: 'Thank you!!! Here's a closer look at my new costume by @theblondsny for #allihave bc its soooo amaazzzzing!! #details.'
In for a treat: Jennifer also revealed her fans are in for a treat as she showed off the new costume for her All I Have Las Vegas Residency
Dare to bare: The 47-year-old songstress has never been afraid to flaunt her famous figure and is clearly willing to pull out all the stops for her Las Vegas residency show
Wrap up your style in sandals by Giuseppe Zanotti x Jennifer Lopez £752.74 Giuseppe Zanotti for Jennifer Lopez Leslie satin ankle wrap sandals
Pre-order them here at Neiman Marcus
Buy now
Italian brand Giuseppe Zanotti has long been on the radar for its beautifully crafted shoes and is often seen on the feet of the rich and famous from Beyonce to Gigi Hadid.
Now, Giuseppe Zanotti has had arguably its biggest endorsement yet, because Jennifer Lopez has launched a collection with the brand.
Last night saw the superstar launch the line at an event and she had ensured she looked fabulous for the occasion. From her sleek white dress to of course shoes from the line, she looked as stunning as ever.
We love the satin sandals with their on-trend ankle wrap finish and if you do too, click right to pre-order them now.
Alternatively, get the look for less with the similar options below.

Jennifer has been sharing a host of raunchy Instagram snaps of late, recently flashing her underboob as she went braless beneath a rolled up white vest.
Despite being keen to flash the flesh, the mother-of-two recently revealed that she didn't use to have any body confidence.
She told W magazine: 'I never appreciated my body or my looks when I was in my 20s.'
Ab fab: JLo has been sharing a host of raunchy Instagram snaps of late, recently flashing her underboob as she went braless beneath a rolled up white vest.
'Now I’m like, Look at me! Look at you! Not in a conceited or arrogant way — I just appreciate myself in a way I didn’t when I was that age. And it’s not about perfection. I like the scars that I have.'
The star - who is dating Drake, 30 - also spoke out about how she admired the confidence of younger men, explaining: 'Men in their 20s are very confident and cocky and women are super insecure.
'And then it flips: Men get super insecure, and women get comfortable in their own skin, in a way that makes them more beautiful.'
Leggy lady! She's gearing up to go back on stage for her Las Vegas residency
